data.title: Wass injury blow for Atletico on debut
data.meta_description: Atletico Madrid's new Danish signing Daniel Wass could be out for a month after spraining knee ligaments in his first Liga game for the club against Barcelona at the weekend, Atletico said Monday.
data.meta_site_name: The Guardian Nigeria News - Nigeria and World News
data.text:
1 day ago

Nigeria boasts a storied, decorated history at youth level in international football.Since the inception of the FIFA Under-17 World Cup in 1985, no nation has won it more times than Nigeria’s five, and from those triumphs have arisen some of the sport’s finest exponents, from Nwankwo Kanu to Victor Osimhen. That spring has begun to…

1 day ago

Team Nigeria may be heading home after a medalless campaign at the Paris 2024 Olympics for the first time since London 2012, but there are two athletes who have Nigerian blood flowing in their veins who have proved in an environment of good planning and organisation, success will always be guaranteed. That is the story…

1 day ago

In a remarkable display of vision, leadership, and innovation, the Lagos State Sports Commission hosted the Lagos Paris Olympics 2024 Esports and Sports Economy Roundtable at the Africa Station Doom, L’lle-Saint-Denis in Paris, France. Convened under the theme “Exploring New Frontiers and Business Opportunities in Sports,” the Director General, Lagos State Sports Commission, Mr. Lekan…

2 days ago

Germany's Yemisi Ogunleye grabbed the gold medal in the women's shot put at the Paris Olympics on Friday throwing her winning 20.00m with her final attempt. Ogunleye's effort took her past New Zealand's Maddison-Lee Wesche, who threw 19.86, her personal best with her fifth throw, while Song Jiayuan took bronze with 19.32. Ogunleye's previous best…

2 days ago

Substitute Sergio Camello struck twice in extra time to settle a remarkable Olympic men's football final on Friday as Spain beat France 5-3 to take gold after Thierry Henry's hosts had earlier staged a dramatic comeback. It had looked as though Spain were going to run away with victory at the Parc des Princes in…

2 days ago

Pep Guardiola hailed the impact made by Julian Alvarez in two seasons at Manchester City with the Argentine set to join Atletico Madrid in a deal worth up to 95 million euros (£81 million, $104 million) READ ALSO:Obi-Martin completes Manchester United medical The 24-year-old cost City just £14 million when he signed from River Plate…

2 days ago

Barcelona signed Spain star Dani Olmo from RB Leipzig on Friday for a reported 60 million euros ($65 million). "The player has signed a contract with the club for the next six seasons, ending on June 30, 2030, and his release clause is 500 million euros," said the Catalan side in a statement. Playmaker Olmo…

2 days ago

President Bola Tinubu, on Friday, sent condolences to the family of Mr. Issa Hayatou, former President of the Confederation of African Football (CAF), who passed away at the age of 77 on Thursday. Mr. Hayatou was also the one-time acting President of FIFA -the world's football governing body. President Tinubu, in a statement, commiserated with…

2 days ago

World record holder and former world champion Tobi Amusan crashed out of the women's 100m hurdles at the Olympics on Friday as defending champion Jasmine Camacho-Quinn sailed into the final. Amusan shocked the world in 2022 when she set a world record of 12.12sec on her way to victory at the World Champoinships in Eugene.…

2 days ago

French Ligue 1 club RC Lens have announced the signing of Nigerian midfielder Hamzat Ojediran from Hungarian club Debrecen. In a statement, Lens announced that Ojediran has signed a four-year deal until 2028. The 20-year-old spent two seasons at Debrecen, and was impressive during his time at the club. Speaking on the signing of Ojediran,…
